name: Thrill Shooting Watermelon 2
description:
Thrill Shooting Watermelon 2 is one of the best and latest fruit shooting games with gun. Aim,shoot fruits, watermelon and be a best fruit hunter in this new fruits shoot game. Crush all the moving fruits with your shooter gun with strong pistol grip. Just like other fruit shooter games you have to blast the sweet watermelon before they got crush in the crushers.
Features:
- FPS game play with a lot of weapons
- Your Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
- Easy and smooth controls for the action game
- Realistic crushing and smash levels
- Real broken blast with 3D animation
- Aim and smash the fruits
- Arcade and time attack mode.
